CustomField.formula: IF( Shop_fit_cost__c > 0, ( Shop_fit_cost__c * Size_GEA__c ) * Shop_fit_Contribution_percent__c , (Village__r.Std_Shop_Fit_Cost__c * Size_GEA__c) * Shop_fit_Contribution_percent__c )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Calculated Shop fit contribution as (Village Shop fit cost * Unit Size) * Shopfit contribution %
CustomField.label: Shop fit contribution (gross)
